Package model

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
model.Model
model.Grid
public class Grid extends Model
Represents the grid of the game board, containing hexagons in different positions.

  • Method Details

    • gridInitialized

      public void gridInitialized()
      Just to notify the view that the grid has been initialized

    • canAdd

      public boolean canAdd(Hexagon hexagon)
      Adds a hexagon to the grid at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      hexagon - The hexagon to be added to the grid.
      Returns:
      True if the hexagon is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • addTile

      public boolean addTile(Tile tile)
      Adds a tile to the grid.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile to be added to the grid.
      Returns:
      True if the tile is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • getHexagon

      public Hexagon getHexagon(int x, int y)
      Retrieves the topmost hexagon at the specified position in the grid.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the hexagon.
      y - The y-coordinate of the hexagon.
      Returns:
      The topmost hexagon at the specified position, or null if no hexagon exists.

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays information about each hexagon in the grid.
